title: Drone Strikes & Pelosi Flights | Daily Best of August 2 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Joe Biden announces Al-Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri has been killed in a U.S. drone strike. Nancy Pelosi touches down and begins her controversial visit to Taiwan. Herschel Walker responds after MSNBC contributor Elie Mystal said "Herschel Walker will do what he's told and that's what Republicans want from their negroes." AOC calls a group of drag queens "patriots." And, Bubba mourns the loss of his favorite Mexican restaurant by pouring out some cheese dip.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Joe Biden announces Al-Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri has been killed in a U.S. drone strike. Nancy Pelosi touches down and begins her controversial visit to Taiwan. Herschel Walker responds after MSNBC contributor Elie Mystal said "Herschel Walker will do what he's told and that's what Republicans want from their negroes." AOC calls a group of drag queens "patriots." And, Bubba mourns the loss of his favorite Mexican restaurant by pouring out some cheese dip.
